help-file.title: "FIRE AURA"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
When the Pyrokinetic unleashes his focused mind upon the plane of fire, the plane itself will bend to his will, infusing him with some or all of the abilities inherent to the plane of fire.
